excerpt: A delicious and easy-to-make vegan version of the classic Caprese sandwich

instructions: Place sliced baguette or bread of choice on a baking sheet and toast in the oven for about 5-7 minutes or until lightly browned.
Spread 2 tablespoons of vegan pesto on each baguette half.
Layer sliced vegan mozzarella cheese, sliced tomatoes, and fresh basil leaves on one half of the baguette.
Place the other half of the baguette on top.
Cut the sandwich into two portions and serve immediately.
